name: Button Clicker (itch)
description:
Clicking! Buttons! This game has all of those and more. A game similar to Cookie Clicker, you click buttons to hire employees so you can click more buttons and hire more employees.

Start your own clicking company and become a clicking legend, forever remembered and revered in the Clicking Hall of Fame. Begin as a meager company with no money and a junk computer. End with millions while sitting in your penthouse on a touchscreen the size of your wall!
